item.title: Poor utility repair on pavement outside 65 Alma Road, 25th June
item.description:
Resident reports poor repair on pavement Undulating surface Large exposed edges which could be a tripping hazzard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Alma Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Poor utility pavement works outside 67 Alma Road, 25th June
item.description:
Resident reports concern over shoddy utility repairs on pavement. Undulating surface which will catch water Raises edges - tripping hazard Broken edges which will fill with water and deteriorate further Iâ€™m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: Https://w3w.co/gently.losses.refuse

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Alma Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Teak sale flyposting all over Leckhampton streets, 25th June
item.description:
As reported in a previous notification, this is one of many flyposters littering the streets of Leckhampton yet again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 273, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flyposting yet again of TEAK sale, 25th June
item.description:
This is almost continuous flyposting by these people. There are about 5-6 posters all over Leckhampton. On the dangerous mini-roundabout at the junction of Leckhampton Rd and Charlton Lane but also several dotted all the way along Leckhampton Rd itself further down towards the shops and also on Old Bath Road. There is also one right on the corner of Pilley Lane at the junction with Old Bath Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Charlton Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cones left on road, 25th June
item.description:
Cones have been left on hatherley Road obstructing parking and traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 292, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
